TEXT.TITLE: ITT <ITT> UNIT FILES FOR PREFERRED STOCK SALE
TEXT.BODY: The Hartford Fire Insurance Co, a unit of ITT Corp, filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission for the shelf sale of 210 mln dlrs in class c and d preferred stock. It said proceeds would be used to redeem class a stock. The First Boston Corp and Merrill Lynch Capital Markets were named underwriters. Reuter
